definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[שׁדשׁ]] (√of foll.; Sab. [[סדתַ]], [[סתַ]], six Sab Denkm:90 Hom:Chrest. 47. 124; Ar. sa0disun sixth (assim. of last cons.), sit=un, sit=ah;un six; Eth. ssu: sdstu: six; As. sudušu (s!) six-fold, seššu, sixth; cf. also Aram. [[שֵׁית]], [[שִׁתָּא]], 4et, 4eto0 six, Nab. [[שת]], Palm. [[שתא]] Ldzb:383 SAC:118).
